description:
Buz TV - Movies & TV Shows is an unofficial informational tool that helps you stay up to date with movie and TV release dates.
You cannot watch or stream content in this app — Tubee is strictly for tracking and discovery.

Quickly find upcoming release dates, get notified about schedule changes, follow your favorite actors, and stay informed about the entertainment you love.

With Buz TV, you’ll always be the first to know when a new season or episode is announced!

---

##  Features

*  Set Reminders for your favorite series and movie release dates.
*  Notifications for new seasons, episodes, and production changes.
*  Follow Actors and get notified about new shows and movies they’re in.
*  Smart Subscriptions to help you save on streaming services.
*  Track Watched Progress for your movies and TV shows.
*  Favorites List for easy access to shows and movies you love.
*  Watch Trailers directly in the app.
*  Browse & Search by title, popularity, rating, or release date.
*  Filter Content by type (Series, Movies, Documentaries) or upcoming release dates.
*  Chat & Discuss your favorite shows, seasons, and episodes with the community.

---

## Subscription Info

Tubee is free with ads. Upgrade to Tubee Pro to:

* Remove ads
* Unlock Smart Subscriptions
* Get Premium Notifications
* Access unlimited favorites and follows

Please note: Tubee Pro does not provide streaming. It’s an informational upgrade only.

Subscriptions will be charged to your iTunes account. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage or cancel auto-renewal anytime in your iTunes Store account settings.

---

## Credits

All metadata, artwork, and images are sourced from TMDb (The Movie Database), a community-maintained movie and TV database.

---

## Disclaimer

Tubee is an independent app and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or associated with any streaming service or company.

Tubee does not stream or connect to any streaming provider. It is an informational tool only.

Privacy Policy:- https://flicksriot.blogspot.com/2025/08/privacy-policy.html

EULA:-
https://flicksriot.blogspot.com/2025/08/eula.html

Contact US:- ameliaross9898@gmail.com

Discover videos from around the world and create your own with easy-to-use tools to capture your life. 

From your morning coffee to your evening commute, TikTok has the videos to make your day. Whether you’re a sports fanatic, a travel lover or simply looking for a laugh, there’s something for everyone on TikTok. Enjoy an endless stream of short videos on things you love most. Watch what you like, skip what you don’t. 
 
WATCH
A personalised video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.  You'll find a variety of videos from Food and Fashion to Sports and DIY - and everything in between.

 
CREATE
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. As many times as you need.
Millions of creators on TikTok showcase their incredible skills and every day life. Let yourself be inspired.
 
ENTERTAIN
Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators.

Take video creation to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. Unlock filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.
 
CUSTOMISE
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily edit your videos.
Trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.
 
ADD MUSIC
Add your favorite sound to your videos with millions of music clips and sounds. 
We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, EM, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

About the Automatic Subscription Renewal:

1. Payment: After you confirm the purchase, the fee will be automatically charged to your Apple iTunes account.

2. Renewal: 24 hours before your subscription expires, the renewal fee will be automatically deducted from your Apple iTunes account. After the renewal payment is processed, your premium membership will be extended automatically.

3. If you want to unsubscribe, please open the iPhone "Settings"-->enter "iTunes Store and App Store"-->click "Apple ID", select "View Apple ID", go to the "Account Settings" page, click "Subscribe" choose GoodShort to unsubscribe. if you do not unsubscription at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

We are looking forward to hearing your comments and ideas. Please email us at contact@goodshort.com

Ready for a laugh and some new connections? Craving the spicy rhythm of salsa, the adrenaline of sports, the zest of Zumba, or the zen vibes of yoga? Whether you've just moved and need new pals, or you're on the hunt for love with no luck on dating sites, or maybe you're a pro wanting to shine a spotlight on your event—guess what? You've landed in the perfect spot!

Introducing Declic App—the ultimate catalyst for fresh connections and friendly outings and meetings. With Declic App, you have the power to plan your own events, gatherings, and meet-ups, or discover and join pre-organized ones. Our application provides the opportunity to connect with new individuals and cultivate authentic relationships in the physical world, and to share and engage in activities aligned with your interests.

Connect with people who share the same interests as you! Outings and events are categorized based on interests. Declic App will recommend events that align with your interests and past outings.

Take the initiative and dive into event organization! Whether you want to try a new restaurant, start a new sport, or attend a festival with no one in your circle interested, Declic App gives you the chance to plan outings and connect with like-minded individuals.

Say NO to virtual connections and create your real-world social network for more authentic connections! Tired of social media or dating sites, and seeking more authentic relationships? Declic gives you the opportunity to meet new people, stay in touch, and let the magic happen.

Stay in touch and communicate with your friends! Declic allows you to follow other users and engage in discussions via chat.

Express yourself and attract new friendships! Each user can add a description to their profile, upload photos, and share interests to introduce themselves to the community and attract people who want to get to know them in real life.

Connect with potential clients and host paid events! Whether you're a tour guide, sports coach, event organizer, private tutor, or any professional, you can launch events on our app and attract your next clients.

In this alpha version of the app, you can organize, discover, and participate in events across 38 cities worldwide. These cities include Tunis, Algiers, Marrakech, Cairo, Dubai, Doha, Munich, London, New Delhi, Singapore, Beijing, Kuala Lumpur, Pretoria, Cape Town, Rio de Janeiro, São Paulo, Istanbul, Lagos, Nairobi, Johannesburg, Dakar, Kuwait, Riyadh, Abu Dhabi, Beirut, Mumbai, Kolkata, Tokyo, Seoul, Shanghai, Hong Kong, Bangkok, Berlin, Barcelona, Amsterdam, Copenhagen, Stockholm, and Prague. Additionally, you can maintain contact and engage in conversations with your newfound friends.

This initial release of our application is multilingual, supporting English, French, and Arabic.

Be the mastermind behind new adventures or join fellow users for a fantastic time. Make new friends, explore exciting passions, and discover activities you never knew existed. The Declic Team sends vibes for an amazing experience full of fun! May you catch that 'Declic' for exciting new activities and awesome connections!

Time to hit the refresh button for free and unlock some brand-new Declics!

Anime Cloud Z

Dive into the ultimate anime gaming experience — where your knowledge, memory, and luck come together in one beautiful cloud of fun.
Enjoy eight exciting mini-games inspired by your favorite anime worlds.

Quiz Game (اختبار الأنمي)

Guess anime from images with multiple-choice questions and a countdown timer. Celebrate your victories with confetti effects.

Memory Game (لعبة الذاكرة)

Flip and match anime character pairs through smooth animations and timed scoring challenges.

Guess Character (خمن الشخصية)

Type your answer, use hints, and earn streak bonuses with smart fuzzy matching that understands your guesses.

Rating Challenge (تحدي التقييم)

Slide to guess anime ratings and earn points for accuracy with a visual rating bar display.

Quick Trivia (معلومات سريعة)

Answer lightning-fast questions across six anime categories with only fifteen seconds per round. Chain combos for extra points.

Match Game (طابق الأنمي)

Drag and drop to match anime titles with their descriptions across five exciting timed rounds.

Word Search (البحث عن الكلمات)

Find hidden anime titles in every direction—horizontal, vertical, and diagonal swipes supported.

Lucky Spinner (عجلة الحظ)

Spin for prizes, multipliers, or bonus games. The luckiest anime fans climb the leaderboard fastest.

Key Features

Smooth animations and transitions

Score tracking and leaderboards

Responsive design for all screen sizes

Full Arabic interface with proper RTL support

Anime Games Cloud — where anime meets fun in the cloud.

اكتشف تجربة مشاهدة متكاملة مع تطبيق قصة عشق، المنصة العربية العصرية التي تجمع بين التكنولوجيا الذكية والمحتوى الغني لتلبية شغف عشاق السينما والتلفاز. بفضل تصميم أنيق وواجهة سهلة الاستخدام، يوفّر لك التطبيق قصه عشق مسلسلات تركيه كل ما تحتاجه لاستكشاف أحدث وأشهر الأعمال من تركيا، الوطن العربي، آسيا، والعالم أجمع.

نحن لسنا مجرد تطبيق تتبع عادي. نحن رحلتك الرومانسية في عالم الدراما، حيث كل فيلم قصة حب، وكل مسلسل مغامرة عاطفية. دع عجلة تقودك لاكتشاف دراما تلامس قلبك!

هل تحتار في اختيار فيلم أو مسلسل لمشاهدته الليلة؟ دع عجلة الساحرة تختار لك! تطبيق متكامل يجمع بين تتبع الأفلام والمسلسلات مع لمسة رومانسية فريدة.


المميزات الرئيسية:

دوّر العجلة واترك الحظ يختار دراما الليلة

رسوم متحركة ساحرة ومؤثرات احتفالية

اختيار ذكي من قائمتك المفضلة


مكتبة شاملة للأفلام والمسلسلات


تصفح آلاف الأفلام والمسلسلات

معلومات مفصلة مع التقييمات والمراجعات

تصنيفات متنوعة: رائجة، شعبية، الأعلى تقييماً

بحث سريع ودقيق


تنظيم مثالي لقوائمك


قائمة المفضلة لأجمل ما شاهدت

قائمة المشاهدة لما تنوي مشاهدته

تتبع ما شاهدته بالفعل

إحصائيات شخصية مفصلة


اختبار المعرفة السينمائية


اختبر معرفتك بعالم السينما والدراما

أسئلة متنوعة وممتعة

تحديات يومية ونقاط تنافسية

شارك نتائجك مع أصدقائك



واجهة داكنة أنيقة وعصرية

ألوان حمراء دافئة تعكس

تجربة مستخدم سلسة وممتعة

دعم كامل للغة العربية


تحديثات مستمرة


محتوى محدث يومياً

أحدث الإصدارات السينمائية

تنبيهات للحلقات الجديدة


لماذا عجلة؟

نحن لسنا مجرد تطبيق تتبع عادي. نحن رحلتك الرومانسية في عالم الدراما، حيث كل فيلم قصة حب، وكل مسلسل مغامرة عاطفية. دع عجلة تقودك لاكتشاف دراما تلامس قلبك!

حمّل التطبيق الآن وابدأ رحلتك في عالم السينمائي!

اكتشف تجربة مشاهدة متكاملة مع تطبيق قصة عشق، المنصة العربية العصرية التي تجمع بين التكنولوجيا الذكية والمحتوى الغني لتلبية شغف عشاق السينما والتلفاز. بفضل تصميم أنيق وواجهة سهلة الاستخدام، يوفّر لك التطبيق قصه عشق مسلسلات تركيه كل ما تحتاجه لاستكشاف أحدث وأشهر الأعمال من تركيا، الوطن العربي، آسيا، والعالم أجمع.

أبرز المزايا:
استكشاف المحتوى بسهولة: تصفّح أحدث الأفلام والمسلسلات العربية، التركية، مسلسلات كورية، والآسيوية، مترجمة ومدبلجة بجودة عالية.

توصيات ذكية: يقدّم لك التطبيق اقتراحات مخصصة تناسب ذوقك بناءً على تفاعلاتك.

تقييمات ومراجعات: اطّلع على آراء المستخدمين، شارك تقييماتك، وتعرّف على أفضل الأعمال.

تصنيفات متنوعة: أكشن، دراما، كوميديا، أنيميشن، عائلي، والكثير من التصنيفات التي تناسب جميع الأذواق.

دليل شامل للمحتوى الرمضاني والعربي: معلومات محدثة حول أبرز مسلسلات رمضان والأعمال الكلاسيكية والمعاصرة.

قائمة مشاهداتي: أنشئ قائمة خاصة بك لتتبع ما شاهدته وما ترغب بمشاهدته لاحقًا.

تنويه هام:

تطبيق موقع قصة عشق مخصص لاستعراض وتصفح معلومات الأفلام والمسلسلات فقط. وجميع الحقوق محفوظة لأصحابها الأصليين.
تم تصميم التطبيق بهدف تقديم معلومات محدثة وشاملة حول الأعمال السينمائية والتلفزيونية الجديدة والكلاسيكية من مصادر متنوعة وموثوقة.

WATCH THE MOST POPULAR AND TOP-RATED ANIME ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
Stream new episodes, classic favorites, and anime movies with the Crunchyroll app—watch for free or upgrade for an ad-free experience. Whether you love action-packed anime, heartwarming slice-of-life stories, or fantasy adventures, Crunchyroll offers the largest anime collection online, featuring a massive library of anime shows and movies available on your favorite device. Watch anime legally, free, and in high quality—all in one place.

ACCESS SERIES FROM FUNIMATION, WAKANIM, AND VRV
Crunchyroll now includes content previously available on Funimation, Wakanim, and VRV, bringing even more anime to one platform. Enjoy a seamless experience with expanded libraries, making Crunchyroll the ultimate destination for anime streaming.

EXCLUSIVE MUSIC VIDEOS AND CONCERTS
Get access to thousands of music videos, concert exclusives, and special performances from top artists worldwide. Watch unique behind-the-scenes footage, live performances, and carefully curated playlists that bring anime soundtracks and J-pop sensations to your screen.

■ Watch anime subbed and dubbed—choose from multiple languages (dub availability varies).

■ Discover Crunchyroll Originals—watch exclusive anime titles created in collaboration with top studios. 
■ Enjoy interactive recommendations—get personalized suggestions based on your viewing habits.

PREMIUM FEATURES  
■ Upgrade to Crunchyroll Premium and save with the annual plan. 
■ Ad-free streaming—enjoy your favorite anime without interruptions. 
■ Early access to new episodes—watch shortly after they air in Japan. 
■ Offline viewing—download episodes to watch anytime (available for Mega Fan and Ultimate Fan members). 
■ Multiple device streaming—watch on up to six devices simultaneously with Ultimate Fan membership. 
■ Crunchyroll Game Vault—play exclusive mobile games with no ads or in-app purchases (Mega Fan and Ultimate Fan members). 
■ Event perks—Ultimate Fan members get first access, early entry, and exclusive benefits at Crunchyroll events.
